title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including a clear definition of consciousness (researching and defining various models or theories such as Orchestrated Objective Reduction (Orch-OR), Integrated Information Theory, and Phantom Limb Syndrome as an additional model), the target audience (scientific community, research institutions, healthcare professionals, and potential clients in the mental health sector), the intended use cases for the tool (research purposes, clinical studies, neurological monitoring, and patient care monitoring), ethical considerations (informed consent, privacy, potential psychological effects, and data security), potential limitations or challenges (technical, practical, ethical, and regulatory), and a preliminary design of the user interface. Include the project timeline and budget estimation.

title: Design System Architecture (Revised)
description: Design the overall system architecture for the ConsciousnessQuantifier project. The design will focus on maintainability, modularity, scalability, and performance requirements. It will encompass the data model, algorithms, user interfaces, and system components. Provide a high-level architecture overview, detailing the interactions between components, potential challenges, risks, and edge cases for each component, as well as error handling mechanisms, performance optimizations, and security considerations. Consider data privacy and compliance, as this is a critical aspect of the project. Upon completion, collaborate with assigned team members to refine and implement the design. Include sections on data privacy and compliance, as well as an implementation plan. To ensure the system's robustness, it's recommended to adopt a microservices architecture for better modularity, scalability, and fault tolerance. Also, incorporate unit testing in the development process for error handling.

title: Develop Data Collection and Processing Pipeline
description: Implement the data collection and processing pipeline for gathering and preparing the necessary data for consciousness quantification.

title: Implement Consciousness Quantification Algorithms
description: Develop and implement the algorithms for quantifying levels of consciousness based on the collected data.

title: Design and Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the ConsciousnessQuantifier tool, including data visualization and reporting features.

title: Set up Database and Data Storage
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions for storing and retrieving the collected data and quantification results.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop and implement security measures and access controls to ensure data privacy and protect the system from unauthorized access.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance
description: Create a comprehensive test suite and implement quality assurance processes to ensure the reliability and accuracy of the ConsciousnessQuantifier tool.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Prepare documentation, user guides, and training materials for the ConsciousnessQuantifier tool.
